00019 #include "pixelgroups.h"

00021 namespace ipl{
00022 
00023 CPixelGroups::CPixelGroups()
00024 {
00025         // default constructor
00026         k_InitGroups(&m_Groups);
00027 }
00028 
00029 CPixelGroups::CPixelGroups(unsigned int InitialSize)
00030 {
00031         k_InitGroups(&m_Groups);
00032         k_AllocGroups(&m_Groups,InitialSize);
00033 }
00034 
00035 CPixelGroups::CPixelGroups(const CPixelGroups& SourceGroups)
00036 { // copy constructor
00037         k_InitGroups(&m_Groups);
00038         *this=SourceGroups; // use assignment operator
00039 }
00040 
00041 CPixelGroups& CPixelGroups::operator=(const CPixelGroups& SourceGroups)
00042 {
00043         // overloading of assignment operator
00044         if (this != &SourceGroups)
00045         {
00046                 // ok to do assignment
00047                 Empty();
00048                 k_AllocGroups(&m_Groups,SourceGroups.GetTotalGroups());
00049                 CPixelGroup* pGroup;
00050                 for(unsigned int count=0; count<SourceGroups.GetTotalGroups(); count++)
00051                 {
00052                         if ((pGroup=SourceGroups.GetGroup(count))!=NULL)
00053                                 AddGroup(*pGroup);
00054                         else
00055                         {
00056                                 ostringstream ost;
00057                                 ost << "CPixelGroups::operator=() Index(" << count << ") out of range (internal error)" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00058                                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00059                         }
00060                 }
00061         }
00062         else
00063         {
00064                 ostringstream ost;
00065                 ost << "CPixelGroups::operator=() Cannot assign CPixelGroups to itself" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00066                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00067         }
00068         return *this;
00069 }
00070 
00071 CPixelGroups::~CPixelGroups()
00072 {
00073         //destructor
00074         for(unsigned int it=0;it<m_pCGroups.size();it++)
00075                 delete m_pCGroups[it];
00076 
00077         k_EmptyGroups(&m_Groups);
00078 }
00079 
00080 void CPixelGroups::Empty()
00081 {
00082         for(unsigned int it=0;it<m_pCGroups.size();it++)
00083                 delete m_pCGroups[it];
00084 
00085         m_pCGroups.clear();
00086         //m_pCGroups.size();
00087 
00088         k_EmptyGroups(&m_Groups);
00089 }
00090 
00091 unsigned int CPixelGroups::GetTotalGroups() const
00092 {
00093         return m_Groups.NumberOfGroups;
00094 }
00095 
00096 CPixelGroup* CPixelGroups::GetGroup(unsigned int Index) const
00097 {
00098         if (Index<m_Groups.NumberOfGroups)
00099         {
00100                 return m_pCGroups[Index];
00101         }
00102         else
00103         {
00104                 ostringstream ost;
00105                 ost << "CPixelGroups::GetGroup() Index(" << Index << ") out of range" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00106                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00107                 return NULL;
00108         }
00109 }
00110 
00111 const TPixelGroups* CPixelGroups::GetConstTPixelGroupsPtr() const
00112 {
00113         return &m_Groups;
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 TPixelGroups* CPixelGroups::GetTPixelGroupsPtr()
00118 {
00119         return &m_Groups;
00120 }
00121 
00122 void CPixelGroups::AddGroup(const CPixelGroup& PixelGroup)
00123 {
00124         TPixelGroup* pOldAddres=m_Groups.pGroups;
00125         k_AddGroupToGroups(PixelGroup.GetConstTPixelGroupPtr(),&m_Groups);
00126         // must also update the m_CGroups member
00127         // first check if the call to k_AddGroupToGroups() changed the addres of m_Groups.pGroups
00128         if ((pOldAddres!=m_Groups.pGroups) && (pOldAddres!=NULL))
00129         {
00130                 for(unsigned int count=0; count < m_Groups.NumberOfGroups-1; count++)
00131                 {
00132                         (m_pCGroups[count])->MoveTPixelGroupPtr(m_Groups.pGroups+count);
00133                 }
00134 
00135         }
00136         CPixelGroup* pPG=new CPixelGroup(m_Groups.pGroups[m_Groups.NumberOfGroups-1]);
00137         m_pCGroups.push_back(pPG);
00138         //CPixelGroup* test=m_pCGroups[65];
00139 }
00140 
00141 bool CPixelGroups::InsertGroupInGroups(const CPixelGroup& PixelGroup, unsigned int Index)
00142 {
00143         bool returnValue=k_InsertGroupInGroups(PixelGroup.GetConstTPixelGroupPtr(),Index,&m_Groups);
00144 
00145         if (returnValue==false)
00146         {
00147                 ostringstream ost;
00148                 ost << "CPixelGroups::InsertGroupInGroups() Failed inserting group" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00149                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00150         }
00152         UpdateAll();
00153         return returnValue;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void CPixelGroups::UpdateAll()
00157 {
00158         for(unsigned int it=0;it<m_pCGroups.size();it++)
00159                 delete m_pCGroups[it];
00160         m_pCGroups.clear();
00161         for(unsigned int count=0; count<m_Groups.NumberOfGroups; count++)
00162         {
00163                 CPixelGroup* pPG=new CPixelGroup(m_Groups.pGroups[count]);
00164                 m_pCGroups.push_back(pPG);
00165         }
00166 }
00167 
00168 void CPixelGroups::Update()
00169 {
00170         if (m_pCGroups.size()<m_Groups.NumberOfGroups)
00171         {
00172                 // must also update the m_CGroups member
00173                 for(unsigned int count=m_pCGroups.size(); count < m_Groups.NumberOfGroups; count++)
00174                 {
00175                         CPixelGroup* pPG=new CPixelGroup(m_Groups.pGroups[count]);
00176                         m_pCGroups.push_back(pPG);
00177                 }
00178         }
00179 }
00180 
00181 bool CPixelGroups::AddColors(const CStdImage& Source)
00182 {
00183         bool returnValue=k_AddColorsToGroups(Source.GetConstTImagePtr(),&m_Groups);
00184         if (returnValue==false)
00185         {
00186                 ostringstream ost;
00187                 ost << "CPixelGroups::AddColors() Failed adding colors" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00188                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00189         }
00190         return returnValue;
00191 }
00192 
00193 bool CPixelGroups::RemoveGroup(unsigned int GroupIndex)
00194 {
00195         bool returnValue=k_RemoveGroup(&m_Groups,GroupIndex);;
00196         if (returnValue==false)
00197         {
00198                 ostringstream ost;
00199                 ost << "CPixelGroups::RemoveGroup() Failed removing group number " << GroupIndex << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00200                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00201         }
00202         else
00203         {
00204                 //delete m_pCGroups[GroupIndex];
00205                 //m_pCGroups.erase(m_pCGroups.begin()+GroupIndex);
00206                 UpdateAll();
00207         }
00208         return returnValue;
00209 }
00210 
00211 bool CPixelGroups::RemoveGroupSlow(unsigned int GroupIndex)
00212 {
00213         bool returnValue=k_RemoveGroupSlow(&m_Groups,GroupIndex);
00214         if (returnValue==false)
00215         {
00216                 ostringstream ost;
00217                 ost << "CPixelGroups::RemoveGroupSlow() Failed removing group" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00218                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00219         }
00221         UpdateAll();
00222         return returnValue;
00223 }

00225 bool CPixelGroups::GetGroupWithPos(unsigned int& GroupIndex,const CPoint2D<INT16>& Pos,
00226                                                                    unsigned int& PosIndex)
00227 {
00228         T2DInt p;
00229         p.x=Pos.GetX();
00230         p.y=Pos.GetY();
00231         return k_GetGroupWithPos(&m_Groups,&GroupIndex,p,&PosIndex);
00232 }
00233 
00234 bool CPixelGroups::GetGroupWithPos(unsigned int& GroupIndex,const CPoint2D<INT16>& Pos)
00235 {
00236         T2DInt p;
00237         p.x=Pos.GetX();
00238         p.y=Pos.GetY();
00239         return k_GetGroupWithPos(&m_Groups,&GroupIndex,p,NULL);
00240 }
00241 
00242 void CPixelGroups::PrintInfo()
00243 {
00244         k_PrintGroupsInfo(&m_Groups);
00245 }
00246 
00247 ostream& operator<<(ostream& s,const CPixelGroups& Groups)
00248 {
00249         s << "**************** PixelGroups info ********************\n" <<
00250                 " Number of groups inserted: " << Groups.GetTotalGroups() <<
00251                 "  TPixelGroup structures allocated: " << 
00252                 Groups.GetConstTPixelGroupsPtr()->AllocatedGroups << endl;
00253         return s;
00254 }
